inputs.title: Chess
inputs.description: A two-player strategy board game played on a checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an 8Ã—8 grid.

inputs.title: Checkers
inputs.description: A strategy board game for two players which involves diagonal moves of uniform game pieces and mandatory captures by jumping over opponent pieces.

inputs.title: Backgammon
inputs.description: One of the oldest known board games. Its history can be traced back nearly 5,000 years to archaeological discoveries in the Middle East.
